actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Presidential Election Fund Act to curtail negative campaign advertising.

summary.text: Amends the Presidential Election Campaign Fund Act to include as a qualified campaign expense an expense which includes the cost of media advertising only to the extent to which the eligible candidate presents his own program, opinion, and qualifications. Provides that the expenses defrayed under such Act shall not include the cost of media advertising other than advertising in which the eligible candidate presents his own program, opinions, and qualifications.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Presidential Election Fund Act to curtail negative campaign advertising.
